title: Email Checker Output
description: Output schema for email verification results stored in the default dataset

email.title: Email Address
email.description: The email address that was verified

is_reachable.title: Reachability Status
is_reachable.description: Overall reachability status: safe, risky, invalid, or unknown

misc.title: Miscellaneous Details
misc.description: Miscellaneous information about the email address (disposable, role account, B2C, gravatar, haveibeenpwned)

smtp.title: SMTP Details
smtp.description: SMTP connection and verification details (can_connect_smtp, is_deliverable, is_catch_all, has_full_inbox, is_disabled)

syntax.title: Syntax Details
syntax.description: Email address syntax validation details (domain, username, is_valid_syntax, normalized_email, suggestion)

debug.title: Debug Information
debug.description: Debugging information about the verification process (backend_name, start_time, end_time, duration, smtp)

error.title: Error Message
error.description: Error message if verification failed completely
